messages.title: A Fresh Approach
messages.content: Faisal Rashid offers a fresh approach. He has new ideas and the energy to fight for the people of Warrington South. He’s not part of the establishment, he’s one of us.

messages.title: DON'T GET TRICKED
messages.content: The Tory candidate here in Warrington South is one of the Tory MPs being investigated over their 2015 election expenses.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will always put the NHS first. We will prioritise the health service and social care.
We will safeguard our environment and build sustainable policies for the wellbeing of the next generation.

issues.environment: We will safeguard our environment and build sustainable policies for the wellbeing of the next generation.
issues.health: Labour will always put the NHS first. We will prioritise the health service and social care.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe in an open, respectful and community-driven political process. I believe in the power of working together.

politicalExperience.achievements: As Mayor Faisal has championed local businesses, worked with the voluntary sector and created jobs for local people.

quotes.text: Faisal Rashid offers a fresh approach. He has new ideas and the energy to fight for the people of Warrington South.
He’s not part of the establishment, he’s one of us.
